metadata.scope: Frontend pages requiring redesign in nextjs-ui-dashboard

pages.name: Dashboard
pages.description: Bento grid layout with 5 dashboard widgets, fully functional portfolio overview
issues: Widgets are static size (large/medium/small) - limited customization
No drag-drop reordering capability
Risk metrics calculation is hard-coded
Performance widget data source undefined
Market overview widget data source undefined

pages.name: Paper Trading
pages.description: Complete trading interface with chart, order form, positions panel. Blue accent styling
mainSections: Page Header - title and mode badge
issues: Hard-coded symbol selection (BTCUSDT)
OrderForm submission not integrated (TODO comment)
Portfolio overview uses grid layout (hard to customize)
No real-time profit/loss updates
Price click handler not connected to OrderForm
No trade confirmation for paper trading

pages.name: Real Trading
pages.description: Extended trading interface with 2-step confirmation, warning banner. Red warning accents
mainSections: Page Header + Mode Badge - title and REAL MONEY MODE badge
Conditional Render - if not in real mode, show mode switch prompt
TradingLayout - same as Paper Trading (if in real mode)
issues: Different risk limits than paper trading (paper: 5%/15%, real: 3%/10%)
Confirmation dialog state managed in page (could be extracted)
Mode switch card only shown if not in real mode
API submission still has TODO comment
No persistence of order confirmation decisions

pages.name: Portfolio
pages.description: Portfolio management placeholder with glass morphism hero card and upcoming features
mainSections: Hero Coming Soon Card - animated glow, glass morphism, decorative accents
Upcoming Features Grid - 4 feature cards (Asset Allocation, Performance, Balance, Risk)
keyComponents: Lucide Icons: PieChart, TrendingUp, Wallet, BarChart3, Sparkles, ArrowUpRight, Shield, Zap
Custom styled cards with glassmorphism, gradients, animated glows, decorative accents
issues: Placeholder only - needs full implementation
No actual portfolio data displayed
No real-time updates
No data integration
Missing: holdings, allocations, performance, risk metrics

pages.name: AI Signals
pages.description: AI signals placeholder with neural network decoration and AI model showcase
mainSections: Hero Coming Soon Card - animated glow (purple/AI themed), glass morphism, neural network SVG
AI Models Section - 4 model cards (LSTM, GRU, Transformer, GPT-4)
Upcoming Features Grid - 4 feature cards (ML Price, Real-time, Entry/Exit, Sentiment)
keyComponents: Lucide Icons: Brain, Zap, Target, LineChart, Sparkles, Activity, Cpu, Network
Custom styled cards with glassmorphism, gradients, animated glows, hover effects
issues: Placeholder only - needs full implementation
No actual AI signals displayed
No real trading signals
No signal history/performance
Missing: latest signals, signal history, model performance, accuracy metrics

pages.name: Settings
pages.description: Comprehensive 7-tab settings interface for bot configuration, API keys, notifications, security
mainSections: Tabs Navigation (7 tabs) - Bot Settings, Per-Symbol, Strategy Tuning, System Health, API Keys, Notifications, Security
Tab 5: API Keys - Binance config, trading permissions
Tab 6: Notifications - email, push, telegram, discord toggles
Tab 7: Security - 2FA, password change, active sessions
issues: 7 tabs is too many - navigation crowded on mobile
API keys are hard-coded demo strings (no real integration)
Notification settings not integrated with backend
Per-symbol and strategy settings offloaded to separate components
ChatBot widget at footer may be distracting
No form validation shown
No success/error feedback

strengths: Dashboard: Bento grid layout is flexible and modern
Trading Pages: 3-column layout works well for trading scenario
Visual Design: Glass morphism effects on placeholders are polished
opportunities: Dashboard: Could add customizable widgets, drag-drop reordering
Paper/Real Trading: Could streamline UI, reduce clutter
Portfolio & AI Signals: Placeholders need full-featured implementations
Settings: Tab overflow on mobile, could use drawer/accordion
technicalConsiderations: Data Sources: Many components have undefined data sources (need integration)
WebSocket State: Dashboard tightly coupled to WebSocket context
Responsive: Current layouts may need mobile optimization
Performance: BentoGrid with 5 widgets could be heavy
Settings complexity: 4 complex subcomponents may need refactoring

unresolvedQuestions: Performance Widget Data: Where does performance chart data come from?
Market Overview Widget: Data source for market overview?
Portfolio Page: Should show paper portfolio or real portfolio or both?
AI Signals Page: Should show real signals from ML backend or placeholder signals?
Settings: Are complex subcomponents (BotSettings, PerSymbolSettings, etc.) finalized?
Data Persistence: Should settings/preferences be persisted to localStorage or backend?
WebSocket Integration: Is websocket state management finalized?
Mobile Layout: Current 3-column trading layout works on mobile?

recommendedPhases.title: High-Impact Redesigns (Quick Wins)
tasks: Dashboard: Add customization features, improve widget loading
Settings: Reorganize tabs, improve mobile layout, add form validation

recommendedPhases.title: Feature-Complete Placeholders
tasks: Portfolio: Implement full portfolio tracking with real data
AI Signals: Implement full signals display with history

recommendedPhases.title: Enhanced Trading UX
tasks: Paper Trading: Streamline interface, add quick actions
Real Trading: Improve confirmation flow, better warnings
